Package game.actors

Class Enemy

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.actors.Actor
game.actors.Enemy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Resettable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Bowser, Goomba, KoopaType, PiranhaPlant
public abstract class Enemy extends Actor implements Resettable
An abstract class that implements commonly used methods by enemies

  • Constructor Details

    • Enemy

      public Enemy​(String name, char displayChar, int hitPoints)
      Constructor. assigns the wander behaviour to be the default and least prioritised behaviour. registers the instance of the enemy
      Parameters:
      name - enemy's name
      displayChar - the enemy's display character
      hitPoints - the enemy's hit points

  • Method Details

    • allowableActions

      public ActionList allowableActions​(Actor otherActor, String direction, GameMap map)
      provides the allowable actions to be performed by the actor based on its current location and situation all enemies can only be attacked or attack HOSTILE opponents if the opponent has the INVINCIBLE status, the actor if immediately killed (removed from the game)
      Overrides:
      allowableActions in class Actor
      Parameters:
      otherActor - the Actor that might be performing attack
      direction - String representing the direction of the other Actor
      map - current GameMap
      Returns:
      the available actions that can be performed by actor

    • playTurn

      public Action playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
      By default, it wipes out all enemies currently present on the map
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - collection of possible Actions for this Actor
      lastAction - The Action this Actor took last turn. Can do interesting things in conjunction with Action.getNextAction()
      map - the map containing the Actor
      display - the I/O object to which messages may be written
      Returns:
      null
